College_Station.Coulter Field: Coulter Field (IATA: CFD, ICAO: KCFD, FAA LID: CFD) is a public-use airport located three nautical miles (6 km) northeast of the central business district of Bryan, in Brazos County, Texas, United States. It is owned by the City of Bryan which is part of the Bryan-College Station area. The airport is used entirely for general aviation.
